user_agent.description: User agent used to make requests. If missing, a random popular user agent is chosen.

exception_gui.description: Type of GUI shown when an error occurs. 'Qt5' is supported if PyQt5 is installed. 'notify-send' is supported if notify-send is on the PATH. If missing, no GUI is used, and the only way to find out the program failed is to read its log file.

url.description: The URL of the RSS feed.

pattern.description: A regex pattern that matches the torrents you want from the RSS feed. Must have a 'number' group to match the episode number, like so: (?P<number>[0-9]{2}).

directory.description: The directory to which the torrent files are downloaded. If missing, the operating system's temporary directory is used.

command.description: Command run after the torrent file is downloaded. '$PATH' is substituted for the torrent file's path. If missing, the file is launched with the default program for opening torrent files.
